TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImplicitResourceKey extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含識別隱含資源索引鍵的欄位。

span.span: Contains fields that identify an implicit resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含可識別隱含資源索引鍵的欄位。The class contains fields that identify an implicit resource key. 隱含的資源指派給控制項，以下列格式：An implicit resource is assigned to a control in the following form: ``` ``` 頁面在剖析期間，隱含的資源會轉換成明確的索引鍵，在表單中 [*篩選*:]*前置詞*。*屬性*[。*子屬性*]。During page parsing, an implicit resource is converted into explicit keys in the form [*filter*:]*prefix*.*property*[.*subproperty*]. 使用指定的前置詞的任何資源值 (在上述範例中，命名空間的首碼`Welcome`) 指派給相符的控制項屬性。Any resource values with the specified prefix (in the preceding example, a prefix of `Welcome`) are assigned to the matching control properties. 例如，假設存在資源檔案或來源程式碼，下列機碼值：For example, suppose values exist in the resource file or source code for the following keys: `Welcome.Text` `Ie:Welcome.Text` `Welcome.Forecolor` 這些值會指派給其各自的控制項屬性。These values are assigned to their respective control properties. 隱含的資源索引鍵可以參考只有本機資源。Implicit resource keys can reference only local resources.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ImplicitResourceKey (string filter, string keyPrefix, string property);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string filter, string keyPrefix, string property) cil managed
Public Sub New (filter As String, keyPrefix As String, property As String)
public: ImplicitResourceKey(System::String ^ filter, System::String ^ keyPrefix, System::String ^ property);

param.name: filter
param.span: 隱含資源索引鍵的篩選值。

span.span: The filter value of an implicit resource key.

param.name: keyPrefix
param.span: 用於識別一組屬性的前置詞。

span.span: The prefix for identifying a group of properties.

param.name: property
param.span: 隱含資源索引鍵的屬性和子屬性 (如果有提供)。

span.span: A property and subproperty, if provided, for an implicit resource key.

summary.span: 使用 、 和 屬性的指定值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified values for the , and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定隱含資源索引鍵的篩選值。

span.span: Gets or sets the filter value of an implicit resource key.

value.span: ，包含隱含資源運算式的篩選值。

span.span: A containing the filter value for the implicit resource expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是指在運算式中的冒號 （:） 之前的值。The property refers to the value before the colon (:) in an expression. 例如，假設您有隱含的資源以下列形式：For example, suppose you had an implicit resource in the following form: ``` ``` 此資源包含三個可能具有當地語系化資源檔或來源的程式碼所擷取的資源值的索引鍵。This resource contains three keys that potentially have localized resource values to retrieve from the resource file or source code. 這些機碼的其中一個是`Ie:Welcome.Text`，在哪些"Ie 」 是值。One of these keys is `Ie:Welcome.Text`, in which "Ie" is the value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyPrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於識別一組屬性的前置詞。

span.span: Gets or sets the prefix for identifying a group of properties.

value.span: ，包含隱含資源運算式的前置詞。

span.span: A containing the prefix for an implicit resource expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性繫結在一起的可以指派給控制項的屬性集合。The property ties together a collection of properties that can be assigned to a control. 屬性參考的值運算式中的冒號 （:） 之後，與第一個句號 （.） 之前。The property refers to the value after the colon (:) in an expression, if present, and before the first period (.). 例如，假設您有隱含的資源以下列形式：For example, suppose you had an implicit resource in the following form: ``` ``` 此資源包含三個索引鍵， `Welcome.Text`， `Ie:Welcome.Text`，和`Welcome.Forecolor`，，可能會有當地語系化資源從資源檔案或來源的程式碼擷取的值。This resource contains three keys, `Welcome.Text`, `Ie:Welcome.Text`, and `Welcome.Forecolor`, that potentially have localized resource values to retrieve from the resource file or source code. 每個索引鍵有`"Welcome"`為值。Each key has `"Welcome"` as the value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Property { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定隱含資源索引鍵的屬性和子屬性 (如果有提供)。

span.span: Gets or sets a property and subproperty, if provided, for an implicit resource key.

value.span: ，包含隱含資源運算式的屬性和子屬性。

span.span: A containing the property and subproperty for an implicit resource expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定要當地語系化控制項屬性。The property specifies the control property to be localized. 屬性之後第一個句號 （.），在運算式中參考的值。The property refers to the value after the first period (.) in an expression. 例如，假設您有隱含的資源以下列形式：For example, suppose you had an implicit resource in the following form: ``` ``` 此資源包含三個索引鍵， `Welcome.Text`， `Ie:Welcome.Text`，和`Welcome.Forecolor`，，可能會有當地語系化資源從資源檔案或來源的程式碼擷取的值。This resource contains three keys, `Welcome.Text`, `Ie:Welcome.Text`, and `Welcome.Forecolor`, that potentially have localized resource values to retrieve from the resource file or source code. 這些索引鍵具有值`"Text"`， `"Text"`，和`"Forecolor"`分別。Those keys have values of `"Text"`, `"Text"`, and `"Forecolor"`, respectively.
